description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记、中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a vice-national level leader. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, a secretary of the Central Secretariat, and the head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive and research-oriented university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学研究专家，北京大学教授。
description.en: An expert in modern Chinese literature and a professor at Peking University.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的干部培训学校。
description.en: A school for cadres directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院

zh-cn: 哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院

description.zh-cn: 哈佛大学的研究生院之一，专注于公共政策和政府管理。
description.en: One of the graduate schools of Harvard University, focusing on public policy and government administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西安市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Xi'an.

nodes.id: 中国共产党福建省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Fujian Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that comprehensively manages ideological work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国高级领导人的一个政治级别和统称。
description.en: A political rank and collective term for senior leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国唐代诗人。
description.en: A Chinese poet of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在河北省秦皇岛市青龙满族自治县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Qinglong Manchu Autonomous County, Qinhuangdao, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市纪委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共北京市纪委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会选举产生的中央纪律检查委员会。
description.en: The Central Commission for Discipline Inspection elected by the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委直属事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: A Chinese politician currently serving as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician currently serving as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who previously served as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊于2001年发表的论文，系统阐述了对“党八股”的研究。
description.en: A paper published by Li Shulei in 2001, systematically elaborating on the study of "Party stereotyped writing".

description.zh-cn: 李书磊出生于河南省原阳县。
description.en: Li Shulei was born in Yuanyang County, Henan Province.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊于1986年9月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Shulei joined the Communist Party of China in September 1986.

description.zh-cn: 1978年考入北京大学图书馆学系学习。
description.en: Admitted to the Department of Library Science at Peking University in 1978.

degree.zh-cn: 中国现代文学专业硕士

description.zh-cn: 1985年获北大中文系中国现代文学专业硕士学位。
description.en: Received a Master's degree in Modern Chinese Literature from the Department of Chinese Language and Literature at Peking University in 1985.

degree.zh-cn: 中国现代文学专业博士

description.zh-cn: 1989年获得北大中文系中国现代文学专业博士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Ph.D. in Modern Chinese Literature from the Department of Chinese Language and Literature at Peking University in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊的博士导师为严家炎。
description.en: Li Shulei's doctoral advisor was Yan Jiayan.

relationships.target: 哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院

description.zh-cn: 1999年在哈佛大学肯尼迪政府学院参加“高级行政人员班”培训。
description.en: Participated in the "Senior Executive Fellows program" at Harvard Kennedy School in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 2008年12月，升任中共中央党校副校长。
description.en: In December 2008, he was promoted to Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 2020年12月，任中央党校（国家行政学院）分管日常工作的副校（院）长，为正部长级。
description.en: In December 2020, he was appointed Executive Vice President of the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance), responsible for daily work, at the ministerial level.

position.en: Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 李书磊升任中共中央党校副校长时，时任校长是习近平。
description.en: When Li Shulei was promoted to Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC, the president was Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在中央党校工作期间，李书磊受到习近平的赏识，为后来的政治晋升奠定了基础。
description.en: During his tenure at the Central Party School, Li Shulei was appreciated by Xi Jinping, which laid the foundation for his subsequent political promotion.

description.zh-cn: 1991年至1993年挂职任中共秦皇岛市青龙县县委副书记。
description.en: From 1991 to 1993, he served on secondment as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Qinglong County Committee in Qinhuangdao.

description.zh-cn: 2004年2月至2006年1月挂职任中共西安市委副书记。
description.en: From February 2004 to January 2006, he served on secondment as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Xi'an Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党福建省委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Head of the Propaganda Department

description.zh-cn: 2014年1月，任中共福建省委常委、宣传部部长。
description.en: In January 2014, he was appointed a member of the Standing Committee and Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Secretary of the Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月，转任中共北京市委常委、纪委书记。
description.en: In December 2015, he was transferred to serve as a member of the Standing Committee and Secretary of the Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十八届中央纪律检查委员会

position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Deputy Secretary

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月，在十八届中央纪委七次全会被增选为常委、副书记。
description.en: In January 2017, he was co-opted as a member of the Standing Committee and Deputy Secretary at the Seventh Plenary Session of the 18th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 2017年11月至2019年3月，兼任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: From November 2017 to March 2019, he concurrently served as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 2022年4月，出任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: In April 2022, he was appointed as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月26日，出任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: On October 26, 2022, he was appointed as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月，在中共二十届一中全会上当选中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: In October 2022, he was elected a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee at the First Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月，在中共二十届一中全会上当选中央书记处书记。
description.en: In October 2022, he was elected a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the First Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月晋升为副国级党和国家领导人。
description.en: In October 2022, he was promoted to a vice-national level Party and state leader.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替黄坤明出任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Huang Kunming as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替袁荣祥出任中共福建省委宣传部部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Yuan Rongxiang as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊卸任中共福建省委宣传部部长，由高翔接任。
description.en: Li Shulei stepped down as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Fujian Provincial Committee, and was succeeded by Gao Xiang.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替叶青纯出任中共北京市纪委书记。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Ye Qingchun as the Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊卸任中共北京市纪委书记，由张硕辅接任。
description.en: Li Shulei stepped down as the Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC, and was succeeded by Zhang Shuofu.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替何毅亭出任中共中央党校常务副校长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded He Yiting as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊卸任中共中央党校常务副校长，由谢春涛接任。
description.en: Li Shulei stepped down as the Executive Vice President of the Central Party School of the CPC, and was succeeded by Xie Chuntao.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替王晓晖出任中共中央宣传部常务副部长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Wang Xiaohui as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊卸任中共中央宣传部常务副部长，由胡和平接任。
description.en: Li Shulei stepped down as the Executive Deputy Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee, and was succeeded by Hu Heping.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊接替杨晓渡出任中国纪检监察学院院长。
description.en: Li Shulei succeeded Yang Xiaodu as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊卸任中国纪检监察学院院长，由杨晓渡接任。
description.en: Li Shulei stepped down as the President of the China Academy of Discipline Inspection and Supervision, and was succeeded by Yang Xiaodu.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊最敬佩的人是唐代诗人白居易。
description.en: The person Li Shulei admires the most is the Tang dynasty poet Bai Juyi.

description.zh-cn: 李书磊发表论文《再造语言》，系统阐述了对于“党八股”的研究。
description.en: Li Shulei published the paper "Rebuilding Language," systematically elaborating on the study of "Party stereotyped writing".
